mapper.insert: insert into orderbasetable (busertable_id, amount, status, orderdate) values (#{busertable_id}, #{amount}, 0, now())
insert into ORDERDETAIL (orderbasetable_id, goodstable_id, SHOPPINGNUM) select #{ordersn}, goodstable_id, SHOPPINGNUM from CARTTABLE where busertable_id = #{uid}
mapper.select: select shoppingnum gshoppingnum, goodstable_id gid from carttable where busertable_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update GOODSTABLE set GSTORE=GSTORE-#{gshoppingnum} where id=#{gid}
update orderbasetable set status=1 where id=#{ordersn}
